body.description: SAMSUNG 980 PRO SSD with integrated heatsink disperses heat to maintain speed, power efficiency, and thermal control, preventing downtime from overheating on Playstation 5 and PCs. Powered by an in-house controller designed to harmonize the flash memory components and the interface for top speed – with a PCIe 4.0 interface that’s 2x faster than PCIe 3.0 SSDs and 12x faster than Samsung SATA SSDs. Achieve fully immersive gameplay with sustained high-performance bandwidth and throughput for heavy-duty applications in gaming, graphics, data analytics, and more. The 980 PRO with Heatsink uses Samsung's own nickel-coated high-end controller to deliver effective thermal control of the NAND chip. With the added heatsink, play confidently on PS5 gaming consoles and PC systems without worries of sudden performance drops from overheating. The 980 PRO with Heatsink has a thin 8.6mm housing, which perfectly fits the PlayStation5. Its slim size and optimized power efficiency are also ideal for building high-performance PC computing and gaming systems. Monitor drive health, optimize performance, protect valuable data, and receive important updates with Samsung Magician to ensure you're always getting the best performance out of your SSD. All firmware and components, including Samsung's world-renowned DRAM and NAND, are produced in-house, allowing end-to-end integration for quality you can trust. Results are based on a comparison with Samsung PCIe 3.0 NVMe SSDs and SATA SSDs.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Blazing Fast Performance and Reliability
reviews.reviewText: I recently upgraded my gaming rig with the SAMSUNG 980 PRO SSD 2TB PCIe NVMe Gen 4 Gaming M.2 Internal Solid State Drive, and I must say, it has exceeded my expectations in every aspect. This powerful SSD not only delivers unrivaled speed but also provides exceptional reliability for both gaming and professional use.Let's start with the performance. The 980 PRO takes full advantage of the PCIe 4.0 interface, offering lightning-fast read and write speeds. With sequential read speeds of up to 7,000 MB/s and sequential write speeds of up to 5,000 MB/s, this SSD offers a noticeable improvement in loading times, reducing game and application launch times to a minimum. It's a game-changer for those who demand high performance.Installing the drive was a breeze, thanks to the M.2 form factor, making it easy to fit into any compatible motherboard slot. The drive also comes with Samsung's reliable Magician software, which allows you to monitor the health and performance of your SSD and even optimize it for maximum efficiency. The software is user-friendly and provides valuable insights into the drive's condition.One of the most impressive aspects of the 980 PRO is its durability and reliability. Samsung is known for producing top-of-the-line SSDs, and this model is no exception. The drive is equipped with advanced technologies like Dynamic Thermal Guard, which helps to maintain optimal operating temperatures, preventing overheating and ensuring consistent performance over extended usage. With a 2TB capacity, you'll have ample space for your games, applications, and media files, without compromising on speed.The 980 PRO is also built to withstand heavy workloads and intense gaming sessions. With a MTBF (Mean Time Between Failures) of up to 1.5 million hours and a TBW (Total Bytes Written) rating of 1,200TB, you can rely on this SSD to handle even the most demanding tasks for years to come. Samsung's reputation for quality shines through in every aspect of this product.In terms of value for money, the 980 PRO is competitively priced considering its exceptional performance and reliability. While it may be slightly more expensive than other options on the market, the noticeable boost in speed and the peace of mind that comes with owning a Samsung SSD make it well worth the investment, especially for gamers and professionals who require fast and reliable storage.In conclusion, the SAMSUNG 980 PRO SSD 2TB PCIe NVMe Gen 4 Gaming M.2 Internal Solid State Drive is a powerhouse storage solution that brings unparalleled performance and reliability to your gaming or professional setup. With lightning-fast speeds, advanced features, and exceptional durability, this SSD is a clear winner in the market. If you're looking for a high-performance storage solution that won't let you down, the 980 PRO is undoubtedly the way to go.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars SAMSUNG 980 PRO SSD 1TB - Blazing-Fast Performance and Cutting-Edge Innovation
reviews.reviewText: Introduction:As a tech enthusiast, I recently upgraded my PC's storage with the SAMSUNG 980 PRO SSD 1TB, and I must say, it has been an absolute game-changer. This NVMe SSD is a true testament to SAMSUNG's commitment to innovation, pushing the boundaries of speed, performance, and reliability in the storage world.Speed and Performance:The SAMSUNG 980 PRO SSD is in a league of its own when it comes to speed and performance. Boasting PCIe 4.0 support, this SSD takes advantage of cutting-edge technology to deliver lightning-fast read and write speeds. The difference in performance is evident, as my operating system boots up within seconds, and applications launch almost instantaneously. Large file transfers and data-intensive tasks are now completed in a fraction of the time compared to traditional SATA-based SSDs.Robust Capacity and Endurance:With a spacious 1TB capacity, the SAMSUNG 980 PRO provides ample storage for my operating system, software, and a substantial library of games. The drive's endurance rating ensures that it can handle heavy workloads without compromising on performance or reliability. Whether I'm running resource-intensive applications or engaging in extended gaming sessions, this SSD maintains its peak performance without breaking a sweat.Innovative Thermal Solution:One feature that truly sets the SAMSUNG 980 PRO apart is its innovative thermal solution. The nickel-coated controller and heat spreader effectively dissipate heat, ensuring the SSD remains cool even during demanding tasks. As someone who values system longevity and performance consistency, I appreciate this thermal design that prevents thermal throttling and extends the lifespan of the drive.User-Friendly Installation:Installing the SAMSUNG 980 PRO SSD was a breeze. The included migration software streamlined the process of transferring data from my old drive to the new SSD, saving me valuable time and effort. Additionally, the user-friendly NVMe installation process is simple and hassle-free, even for those who are new to upgrading hardware components.Reliability and Trustworthiness:SAMSUNG's reputation for reliability is well-founded, and the 980 PRO SSD lives up to that standard. With a 5-year limited warranty, I have peace of mind knowing that my investment is protected. The SSD's stable performance and SAMSUNG's reputation for exceptional customer support reinforce my confidence in this product.Energy-Efficient and Environmentally Friendly:The 980 PRO SSD is also designed with energy efficiency in mind. Its low power consumption not only reduces electricity costs but also minimizes heat generation, contributing to a greener and more environmentally friendly computing experience.Conclusion:In conclusion, the SAMSUNG 980 PRO SSD 1TB is an outstanding storage solution that redefines speed, performance, and reliability. Its PCIe 4.0 support and innovative thermal design set it apart from its competitors, making it a top choice for gamers, content creators, and power users alike. With blazing-fast speeds, generous capacity, and a user-friendly installation process, this SSD has significantly improved my computing experience. If you're seeking a top-of-the-line SSD that delivers unrivaled performance and durability, the SAMSUNG 980 PRO SSD 1TB is an investment worth making. I wholeheartedly recommend this SSD to anyone looking to elevate their computing performance to new heights.

Cumpre o que promete, muito bom. Coloquei no meu nitro 5 e ta funcionando perfeitamente!

TL;DR I give this a 9/10 with only one point off because it's more expensive than other options, although it's also faster than said options.I chose this drive because I wanted excellent performance and capacity without any compromises. This was my first M.2 NVMe drive and boy am I impressed! Installation was easy with the only issues being related to the mount and heat sink on the motherboard. Once installation was done, installation of the OS onto this drive was easy and identical to the process to installation for a SATA drive.I primarily use this in a PC I've built for gaming using an Intel 13700K and a GeForce GTX 1080Ti. Loading times of games is absolutely impressive. Playing Diablo 4 the loading time is about 1 second to get from the game menu to moving around in-game. Not all games load instantly though, but every game certainly loads much faster than when played off of a SATA drive. Forza Horizon 5 still takes about 5-10 seconds which is only about half as long as it took to load on my previous SATA3 SSD.The Samsung Magician software that manages these drives and updates firmware is simple and unobtrusive. I do recommend installing the software as it not only ensures you get timely firmware updates, but also that your drive is optimized properly for your OS. The app also allows you to benchmark your drive to ensure you're getting the speed that you paid for.Pricing is always the challenge with Samsung NVMe drives. Other drives may be slightly slower, but cost significantly less. My recommendation is that if you're looking for the top speed and price is no option, take a look at this drive. If you are more price sensitive but can wait for a sale, watch for a bigger discount. I purchased this on Black Friday or Cyber Monday and saved $100. Regardless, you can't get a better drive!This drive gets a 9/10 with only one point off for the high price point. If it was cheaper I'd have bought two - one for a backup!
Demasiado sencillo de colocar y funcionó a la perfección con el PS5. La calidad del producto y la velocidad superaron mis espectativas.
